title: Hotel cancellation confirmations and refund receipts
dataVerified: Guest name, booking reference, cancellation date, refund amount, cancellation policy
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Cancellation status (confirmed/refunded). Link to hotel/OTA system (guest only, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake cancellation confirmations (claiming refund for non-refundable rate). Domain binding verifies hotel/OTA. Refund dispute documentation. Prevents double-refund fraud. Credit card chargeback evidence.
